thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: DONNA

author: DONNA
title: DONNA
text: I think it's a wonderful idea Thriftbooks has. I love to read and this makes it easy and cheap to get books I want to read without leaving my house. With free shipping over a $10 purchase is great too. I also love the "deals" they have. I am very happy I found them. I checked out some other sites with "cheap" used books and they were much more expensive and some charged for shipping too.
